column4: hi all.  installed ubuntu 5.04.  after booting, screen goes black but on with no sound.  pressed ctl-alt-f1.  logged in.  sudo killall gdm.  startx.  screen goes black and off completely.  but can hear logging in music.  what to do for a complete newbie?
heze suggested you check your laptop's output signal
you need to install ATI stuff  (someone correct me here if I'm wrong)
do you have an ATI video card?
try to reconfigure your X with Mesa for now
it is possible it is not compiled as a module?
the error related to not being able to load something?
it sounds like the module (via-something) wasn't compiled as module?
do the x reconfiguration and this time really look at the video driver options
lemme see how to manually configure and update xorg.conf under Debian
still intrigued why via didn't work for you
